UIButton Class Reference

A simple button class that uses SDL TTF text and NGL triangle planes. More...

#include <UIButton.h>

[legend]

Detailed Description

A simple button class that uses SDL TTF text and NGL triangle planes.

Author:
Will Herbert
Version:
1.0
Date:
Last revision 10/05/2015 Updated to comply with doxygen and NCCA coding standard

bool UIButton::isClicked ( int  _x,
int  _y 
)

a method to detect if a button has been clicked, based on it's NDC screen position and dimensions

Parameters:
[in] _x the input x pixel position of the mouse click
[in] _y the input y pixel position of the mouse click

Definition at line 80 of file UIButton.cpp.

References m_buttonDimensions, m_buttonPos, and m_windowDimensions.

00081 {
00082   ngl::Vec2 ndc;
00083   ndc.m_x = ((2.f * _x) / m_windowDimensions.m_x) - 1.f;
00084   ndc.m_y = 1.f - ((2.f * _y) / m_windowDimensions.m_y);
00085 
00086   if (ndc.m_x >= (m_buttonPos.m_x - m_buttonDimensions.m_x/2) && ndc.m_x <= (m_buttonPos.m_x + m_buttonDimensions.m_x/2) &&
00087       ndc.m_y >= (m_buttonPos.m_y - m_buttonDimensions.m_y/2) && ndc.m_y <= (m_buttonPos.m_y + m_buttonDimensions.m_y/2))
00088   {
00089     return true;
00090   }
00091   else
00092   {
00093     return false;
00094   }
00095 }

method to load transform data to the shaders

00177   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00178   (*shader)["nglColourShader"]->use();
00179   shader->setShaderParam4f("Colour", m_buttonColour.m_x, m_buttonColour.m_y,m_buttonColour.m_z, 1.f);
00180 
00181   ngl::Transformation t;
00182   t.setPosition(ngl::Vec3(m_buttonPos.m_x, m_buttonPos.m_y, 0.f));
00183   t.setRotation(90.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00184 
00185   ngl::Mat4 M;
00186   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00187   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00188   M=t.getMatrix();
00189   MV=  M*ngl::lookAt(ngl::Vec3(0, 0, 10), ngl::Vec3(0, 0, 0), ngl::Vec3(0, 1, 0));
00190   MVP= MV*ngl::ortho(-1, 1, -1, 1, 0.1f, 100.f);
00191   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);

ngl::Vec3  _colour,
ngl::Vec2  _offset 
)
